about_the_game:
Play as Buffet Knight, a tiny hero with a big appetite in this hungry action adventure. Disaster strikes as the Demon Chef steals all the food from Gourmet Kingdom, and it is up to you to save the culinary world!

Explore a diverse and colourful world spanning from the lush vegetable forests to the lofty cotton candy clouds. Delve into puzzling dungeons, battle monsters, find treasures and discover secrets! Gobble up everything around you, but will your appetite be satisfied as the connoisseur of all that is delicious?

Thanks for the Meal!

Swallow food, objects, and even your fallen foes to fuel your attacks!

Earn New Abilities!

Discover skills to aid in both combat and exploration!

Evolve and Grow Stronger!

Choose attributes to upgrade, find unique accessories to augment your abilities!

Features

  • A delicious single player action adventure with charming pixel art and a catchy soundtrack.

  • A colourful, interconnected food-themed world to explore full of treasures and secrets to find.

  • Challenge monster and puzzle-laden dungeons, and battle mighty bosses.

  • Evolve and become stronger! Learn new abilities, level up your attributes, equip accessories.

  • Multiple endings to discover!
detailed_description:
Buffet Knight - Decadent Full Course Demo


Have a taste of Buffet Knight’s adventure in this demo appetiser, featuring up to the end of the first dungeon. Transfer your progress into the full game!


Wishlist Now!

Play as Buffet Knight, a tiny hero with a big appetite in this hungry action adventure. Disaster strikes as the Demon Chef steals all the food from Gourmet Kingdom, and it is up to you to save the culinary world!

Explore a diverse and colourful world spanning from the lush vegetable forests to the lofty cotton candy clouds. Delve into puzzling dungeons, battle monsters, find treasures and discover secrets! name: Buffet Knight - Decadent Full Course

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Gobble up everything around you in this hungry action adventure as Buffet Knight. Battle monsters, conquer puzzling dungeons, save the culinary world! The more you eat, the stronger you grow... But will you end up biting off more than you can chew?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
